Stays & Hinges

We replace bent or worn awning stays and service hinges so windows open, hold position and seal properly across Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Where we work

Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Related: Security stays • Window repairs

Stays & hinges FAQs

  • Do you work on storm-bent awning stays?
    Yes. We replace bent stays, re-align the sash and test seals so the window holds position and seals properly.
  • Can you fit restrictors for child safety?
    Yes. We install restrictors/security stays and match finishes to your aluminium joinery.

Get a quote for stays & hinges

Call 021 638 205

FAQs

Are awning stays the same as hinges?

Many people call them window hinges, but awning stays both support and control the opening. We replace stays and service hinges so windows open, hold position and seal.

Can you match my existing hardware?

Yes. We carry common sizes/finishes on the van and source compatible parts for older aluminium joinery.
